SELECT src.*, m.mb_id, m.mb_email FROM `member` m INNER JOIN ( SELECT s.str_name, s.mb_id, s.str_date, s.str_tel, s.str_address, s.str_delete , COUNT(CASE WHEN rsv_cmt_delete=1 THEN 1 END) AS cnt, AVG(CASE WHEN rsv_cmt_delete=1 THEN rsv_cmt_point END) AS avg, COUNT(CASE WHEN rsv_code=1 THEN 1 END) AS exp, COUNT(CASE WHEN rsv_code=2 THEN 1 END) AS com, COUNT(CASE WHEN rsv_code=3 THEN 1 END) AS can FROM `store` s RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT r.rsv_no, r.rsv_code, c.rsv_cmt_point, c.rsv_cmt_delete, r.str_number FROM `reservation` r RIGHT JOIN `rsv_comment` c ON r.rsv_no = c.rsv_no GROUP BY r.rsv_no
UNION
SELECT r.rsv_no, r.rsv_code, c.rsv_cmt_point, c.rsv_cmt_delete, r.str_number FROM `reservation` r LEFT JOIN `rsv_comment` c ON r.rsv_no = c.rsv_no GROUP BY r.rsv_no ) rc ON s.str_number = rc.str_number GROUP BY s.str_number )src ON m.mb_id = src.mb_id
WHERE src.str_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') AND src.mb_id=#{mb_id} ORDER BY src.str_date DESC LIMIT #{page} , 6 ;
